edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared
Enum NodeClass

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<NodeClass>
      edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.shared.NodeClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<NodeClass>
public enum NodeClass
extends java.lang.Enum<NodeClass>

Used to differentiate kinds of nodes. Not sure how useful this will turn out to be... I've commented the ideas behind these node classes

Author:
Ryan J. McCall

Enum Constant Summary
action
          Action nodes have role links
category
          Nodes representing a category.
feature
          Feature nodes represent a perceptual feature
feeling
          Feeling nodes send a bit of extra activation to their neighbors
instance
          Instance or object nodes are typically objects present in the environment.
none
          Just-made nodes may not have a class distinction yet.

Enum Constant Detail

instance

public static final NodeClass instance
Instance or object nodes are typically objects present in the environment. Grounded in the stimuli

category

public static final NodeClass category
Nodes representing a category. Have instance nodes and feature nodes as children.

action

public static final NodeClass action
Action nodes have role links

feature

public static final NodeClass feature
Feature nodes represent a perceptual feature

feeling

public static final NodeClass feeling
Feeling nodes send a bit of extra activation to their neighbors

none

public static final NodeClass none
Just-made nodes may not have a class distinction yet.
